author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Comtech Telecommunications Q2 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.66
text:
March 7 (Reuters) - Comtech Telecommunications Corp :
* COMTECH TELECOMMUNICATIONS CORP ANNOUNCES RESULTS FOR FISCAL 2018 SECOND QUARTER AND UPDATES ITS FISCAL 2018 GUIDANCE
* SEES 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA $72.0 MILLION TO $76.0 MILLION * COMTECH TELECOMMUNICATIONS - SEES Q3 CONSOLIDATED NET SALES AND ADJUSTED EBITDA TO BE HIGHER THAN RELATED AMOUNTS ACHIEVED IN Q2 BY ABOUT 10 PERCENT
* SEES 2018 GAAP DILUTED EPS $1.08 TO $1.23 * Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.08, REVENUE VIEW $124.6 MILLION â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
